creator: dr_mac@mail.utexas.edu
text:
Downloaded from binary: httpd-apache_2.0.35-powerpc-apple-
darwin5.3.tar.gz

removed prebuilt binary and redid ./configure and make.

Everything worked!! So then I tried the standard httpd-2.0.35.tar.gz
and again, kept getting the same _pthread_sigmask error when trying to 
link htpasswd.

So I removed the entire expat subtree from the standard and copied over 
the expat subtree from the binary source then reconfigured the standard 
source. Amazing. It worked.

My question is, why is the expat source different in the binary tarball? Most 
differences included the addition of Darwin to the configure.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
I'm guessing you haven't read this:
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/patches/apply_to_2.0.35/
Whoever made the binary probably patched the libtool in the expat directory.

If that does not explain the issues you see, please feel free to reopen this
report.

That was one of the first things I looked at. That patch only changes the
/usr/share/libtool/ltconfig file which isn't in the expat dir. There are other 
changes between the two as well.
creator: dr_mac@mail.utexas.edu
slive@apache.org
text:
What other changes? (Vagueness is not one of the qualities of a good bug
report ;-)

After applying the patch, ./buildconf (in the root of the dist) must be rerun.
This will, in turn, update other files in the distribution.

The following steps seem to work:

Download & untar source.
Apply patch (affected file: /usr/share/libtool/ltconfig)
Run buildconf
./configure \
--enable-usertrack --enable-unique-id \
--enable-info --enable-cgid --enable-cgi \
--enable-vhost-alias --enable-speling \
--enable-rewrite --enable-so

It did compile, however I did get the following warnings:
/usr/bin/ld: warning multiple definitions of symbol _regcomp
/var/root/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/pcre/.libs/libpcre.al(pcreposix.lo) definition of 
_regcomp in section (__TEXT,__text)
/usr/lib/libm.dylib(regcomp.o) definition of _regcomp
/usr/bin/ld: warning multiple definitions of symbol _regexec
/var/root/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/pcre/.libs/libpcre.al(pcreposix.lo) definition of 
_regexec in section (__TEXT,__text)
/usr/lib/libm.dylib(regexec.o) definition of _regexec
/usr/bin/ld: warning multiple definitions of symbol _regfree
/var/root/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/pcre/.libs/libpcre.al(pcreposix.lo) definition of 
_regfree in section (__TEXT,__text)
/usr/lib/libm.dylib(regfree.o) definition of _regfree
/usr/bin/ld: warning unused multiple definitions of symbol _regerror
/var/root/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/pcre/.libs/libpcre.al(pcreposix.lo) definition of 
_regerror in section (__TEXT,__text)
/usr/lib/libm.dylib(regerror.o) unused definition of _regerror
creator: dr_mac@mail.utexas.edu
